overview: Listen to the sweet vocals of Dreamcatcher serenade you in its purest form, with the soft melodies of their rearranged compositions in a way you've never heard them before.  Dreamcatcher showcases their colorful vocals and present a new version of their discography with unplugged arrangements for a new side of them.  Join them on the journey to utopia.
tagline: First Day of Dreamcatcher's 3rd Online Concert that Concludes the Dystopia Series
title: Dreamcatcher [Crossroads: Part 1. Utopia]
